titles.title: Congratulating the Hastings College women's basketball team for winning 2 consecutive National Association of Intercollegiate Athletics (NAIA) Division II national championships.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 5/1/2003--Introduced. Congratulates the Hastings College women's basketball team of Hastings, Nebraska, for winning two consecutive National Association of Intercollegiate Athletics Division II national championships.
